overview: Full-length documentary featuring design leaders and product designers from 15+ industry-toppling companiesâ€”valued at more than $1 trillion dollars combined.  The film chronicles the true nature of design and the design-driven business revolutions being shaped around the world through the designers eyes.  Get a never-before-seen look into the perspectives, processes, and design approaches of leaders at industry-toppling brands and discover how these companies are disrupting billion dollar industries through design.
title: Design Disruptors
